BackstoryDef.title: Hut tender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While the others were out hunting and foraging, [PAWN_nameDef] would stay at home to cook and take care of the young and sick.

BackstoryDef.title: Digger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] tribe carved their home deep into the side of a mountain. [PAWN_nameDef] feels most at home picking through rock and shoring up cave walls.

BackstoryDef.title: Moonshade farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a master farmer. [PAWN_pronoun] has spent a lot of time growing moonshade inkcap mushrooms.

BackstoryDef.title: Shaman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] tribe’s elder shaman was killed in a raid, [PAWN_nameDef] took on the role. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

BackstoryDef.title: Hermit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never much liked the tribal council or the yearly festivals. [PAWN_pronoun] prefers the open plain and the lonely whistle of wind through the rocks. [PAWN_pronoun] visits [PAWN_possessive] tribe from time to time, but for the most part [PAWN_pronoun] takes care of [PAWN_objective]self using [PAWN_possessive] own survival skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Story teller
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of a long line of story tellers in [PAWN_possessive] tribe. Every night around the fire, [PAWN_pronoun] would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories.

BackstoryDef.title: Wrestling champion
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used his strength and charisma to become a champion of the wrestling pits in [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

BackstoryDef.title: Guide
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since [PAWN_possessive] tribe has made contact with local humans, [PAWN_nameDef] has contracted [PAWN_possessive] services out as a guide to the local area. Frequent contact with ancient relics has made [PAWN_objective] fairly comfortable with the old technology.

BackstoryDef.title: Berserker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearsome berserker. [PAWN_pronoun] participated in many battles.

BackstoryDef.title: Tailor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert at working leather into sturdy clothing for [PAWN_possessive] kin.

BackstoryDef.title: Abandoned child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born sickly. Thinking that [PAWN_pronoun] would only burden the tribe, [PAWN_possessive] parents left [PAWN_objective] out in the elements. Somehow, [PAWN_pronoun] survived.

BackstoryDef.title: Cave child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a large and intricate cave complex that extended deep into a mountainside. [PAWN_pronoun] helped the adults maintain and improve the deep caves.

BackstoryDef.title: Fire keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for keeping the tribe’s fire going. [PAWN_pronoun] took this responsibility very seriously.

BackstoryDef.title: Herder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] tended the tribe’s herds, keeping them safe from predators and treating the sick. It was quiet work, but [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed being away from people.

BackstoryDef.title: Reclusive child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] didn’t learn to speak until [PAWN_pronoun] was nearly 5 years old, and, even then, [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to keep to [PAWN_objective]self. When [PAWN_pronoun] was in [PAWN_possessive] early teens, [PAWN_pronoun] made a habit of wandering off from the village to live in the wilderness for weeks at a time.

BackstoryDef.title: Scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood escaping grunt work to go digging through wrecks and ruins for treasures. [PAWN_possessive] natural curiosity got [PAWN_objective] into a lot of trouble, but it also yielded many interesting finds.

BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s entire tribe was wiped out in a raid. Though [PAWN_pronoun] was adopted by another group, [PAWN_pronoun] was emotionally scarred, and preferred to stay near home, cooking and tending crops.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribe child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the tribe, running around the village, learning essential skills from [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] never learned to read and never saw a machine that wasn't an ancient ruin.

BackstoryDef.title: Vengeful child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] returned to [PAWN_possessive] village to find that it had been wiped out by bandits. [PAWN_pronoun] swore revenge on the attackers and began a violent rampage across the wilderness.
